General.Name: Lifan Industry Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Lifan Technology (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automobiles, motorcycles, and engines in China and internationally. The company offers motorcycle, automobile, and general-purpose gasoline engines. It also researches, develops, produces, and sells new energy products. The company offers its products under the Lifan brand. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Lifan Industry (Group) Co., Ltd and changed its name to Lifan Technology (Group) Co., Ltd. in March 2021. Lifan Technology (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.

3.Name: Yajun  Ren
